eastrailmain.note: Original Kowloon–Canton Railway opened 1 Oct 1910; many stations and sections added/modernised later. See 'Expansion since the 1990s' and 2022 cross-harbour extension.

lokmachauspur.note: Lok Ma Chau spur / Lok Ma Chau station modern operations – assigned 2007 as an approximate modernisation/usage year; verify exact spur opening date.

racecoursespur.note: Racecourse station historically pre-dates recent expansions; assigned to early East Rail origin (1910) – please verify precise date for the Racecourse spur.

Tuen_Ma_line.note: Tuen Ma is a merged line with phased openings: West Rail (20 Dec 2003), Ma On Shan (2004), Kowloon Southern Link (2009), Phase 1 (14 Feb 2020), full line (27 Jun 2021). Use `phases` for fine-grained mapping.

disneyline.note: Penny's Bay rail link opened 1 Aug 2005.

airportexpress.note: Airport Express opened 6 Jul 1998; AsiaWorld–Expo extension opened 20 Dec 2005. If this path contains multiple segments, prefer per-segment entries (see airportexpress_seg*).

tungchungline.note: Tung Chung line opened 22 Jun 1998; Sunny Bay (1 Jun 2005) added for Disneyland link.

kwuntongline.note: Kwun Tong line initial section opened 1 Oct 1979; later extensions in 1989 and 2016 (Whampoa).

tseungkwanoline.note: Tseung Kwan O line opened 4 Aug 2002; LOHAS Park branch opened 26 Jul 2009.

islandline.note: Island Line opened in the mid-1980s (1985); verify specific section dates if needed.
